guide.introduction:
How to Repair Nintendo DS Lite (NDSL) Broken Hinge 1/2

The hinge usually snaps on the right hand side where the hinge axle is located. This video is a step-by-step guide on how to remove the broken sections of your ds lite case, and replace the old parts with those from a new replacement nintendo ds Lite shell. If your DSL top lcd screen also will not power on, you have likely twisted the top lcd ribbon as well and will need to replace your Nintendo DS Lite Top LCD .

Find low cost replacement Nintendo DS Lite Shells/Cases at the Nintendo Repair Shop in all colors. Also visit our online store for all your nintendo dsi repair parts at a low cost with fast shipping!

Be sure to check out part 2 on how to repair a nintendo dsi broken hinge .
